creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Trust Fund and gift of funds from Nivin MacMillan
text: This painting shows nearly ten figures, all men, preparing in the arched tunnel opening to an arena. They are dressed in red and yellow outfits and wear distinctive black hats. Two horses stand at the read on the far right side, ready to walk into the arena. Beyond the opening oe can see seats filled with a large crowd bathed in sunlight.
title: Before the Bullfight
